analyzed: de bzhin du yang bshad rgyud ye shes rdo rje kun la btus par byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol ba //
translated: Similarly, in the explanatory tantra the Compendium of Vajra Wisdom, the great bodhisattvas request:

original: bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags //
translated: ‚ÄúBhagavƒÅn, what are the seven ornaments?‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn replied:

original: gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang mtha' drug gi bshad pa dang / rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang / bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang / rab tu dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang / gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma yongs su brtag pa dang /
analyzed: gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang mtha' drug gi bshad pa dang / rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang / bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang / rab tu dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang / gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma yongs su brtag pa dang /
translated: The explanation of the five introductions and the six parameters, the four reasonings, the four explanations, the two divisions, the examination of the five kinds of disciples,

original: bden pa rnam pa nyis kyis dgongs pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: bden pa rnam pa nyis kyis dgongs pa'o zhes so //
translated: and the intention with the two kinds of truths.

original: rgyas par bshad pa yang 'dir mi dang rgyu mtshan dang byed pa po dang / tshad dang dgos pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas par bshad pa yang 'dir mi dang rgyu mtshan dang byed pa po dang / tshad dang dgos pa'o //
translated: The extensive explanation here is the person, the reason, the agent, the measure, and the purpose.

original: dgongs pas bshad dang dgongs min dang / drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad dang dgongs min dang / drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don //
translated: The intentional explanation and the non-intentional, the provisional meaning and the definitive meaning,

original: sgra ji bzhin pa dang sgra ji bzhin pa min pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa dang sgra ji bzhin pa min pa'o //
translated: the literal and the non-literal.

original: rgyud dang gleng gzhi dang / nges pa'i tshig dang rgyu'o //
analyzed: rgyud dang gleng gzhi dang / nges pa'i tshig dang rgyu'o //
translated: The tantra, the nidƒÅna, the etymology, and the cause.

original: yi ge'i don dang spyi'i dan sbas pa dang / mthar thug go //
analyzed: yi ge'i don dang spyi'i dan sbas pa dang / mthar thug go //
translated: The meaning of the syllables, the general meaning, the hidden meaning, and the ultimate.

original: tshogs la bshad pa dang / slob ma la bshad pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs la bshad pa dang / slob ma la bshad pa'o //
translated: The explanation to the assembly and the explanation to the disciples.

original: rin po che dang / tsandan dang / padma dang / padma dkar po dang / autpala'o //
analyzed: rin po che dang / tsandan dang / padma dang / padma dkar po dang / autpala'o //
translated: jewel, sandalwood, lotus, white lotus, and utpala.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: The conventional truth and the ultimate truth.

original: rigs kyi bu kun rdzob ni mi brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu kun rdzob ni mi brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //
translated: Son of noble family, the conventional is unstable and wavering.

original: de'i bden pa ni chu zla lta bu'o //
analyzed: de'i bden pa ni chu zla lta bu'o //

original: don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa nyid chen po bco brgyad do //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa nyid chen po bco brgyad do //
translated: The ultimate truth is the eighteen great emptinesses.

original: de'i bden pa ni mtha' ste gnas kyi rim pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: de'i bden pa ni mtha' ste gnas kyi rim pa'o zhes so //
translated: Its truth is the end, the stage of the abode.

original: rdo rje phreng ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Following the Vajra Garland, the individual extensive explanations should be stated.

original: rgyud kyi mtshan ni ming yin la /
analyzed: rgyud kyi mtshan ni ming yin la /
translated: The name of the tantra is the name.

original: rgyu mtshan kye'o chags can gyi'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan kye'o chags can gyi'o //
translated: The reason is ‚Äúhey!‚Äù of the passionate one.

original: 'di yi byed po rdo rje sems //
analyzed: 'di yi byed po rdo rje sems //
translated: The agent of this is Vajrasattva.

original: tshad ni rim gyis la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ni rim gyis la sogs pa'o //
translated: The measure is gradual, and so on.

original: dgos par bgrangs pa la sogs pa ni //
analyzed: dgos par bgrangs pa la sogs pa ni //
translated: The enumeration of the purpose, and so on,

original: sangs rgyas nyid kyang mchog yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid kyang mchog yin no //
translated: is also the supreme buddhahood.

original: @255a * // khyad 'phags 'dod pa'i sems can la //
analyzed: @255a * // khyad 'phags 'dod pa'i sems can la //
translated: For the sentient beings who desire the special,

original: chos kyi de nyid rab gsal byed //
analyzed: chos kyi de nyid rab gsal byed //
translated: And the reality of phenomena is made clear.

original: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
analyzed: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
translated: It is neither attached nor detached.

original: zhes pa la sogs dgongs bshad do //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs dgongs bshad do //
translated: And so on. This is the intentional explanation.

original: dman la de nyid gsal ston pa //
analyzed: dman la de nyid gsal ston pa //
translated: The reality is taught clearly to the inferior.

original: dgong spa min pas bshad pa ste /
analyzed: dgong spa min pas bshad pa ste /
translated: It is explained as not being intentional.

original: bdag med thams cad stong pa ru //
analyzed: bdag med thams cad stong pa ru //
translated: All selflessness is empty.

original: dag go zhes sogs bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dag go zhes sogs bstan pa'o //
translated: It is pure, and so on. This is the teaching.

original: skal ngan la sbas padma dang // tsandan sogs bshad drang ba'i don //
analyzed: skal ngan la sbas padma dang // tsandan sogs bshad drang ba'i don //
translated: The lotus, sandalwood, and so on, are explained as hidden for the unfortunate.

original: pad sogs btsun mo la sogs su //
analyzed: pad sogs btsun mo la sogs su //

original: yang dag don ston nges pa'i don //
analyzed: yang dag don ston nges pa'i don //

original: bya ba spyod pa gnyis ka'i rgyud //
analyzed: bya ba spyod pa gnyis ka'i rgyud //

original: rtog pa sogs su ji bzhin sgra //
analyzed: rtog pa sogs su ji bzhin sgra //
translated: are just the words in the tantras and so on.

original: dkyil 'khor can sogs cho ga ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor can sogs cho ga ni //

original: skye bos gsal bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: skye bos gsal bar bstan pa'o //
translated: are taught clearly by the people.

original: bshang ba gci ba la sogs sgra //
analyzed: bshang ba gci ba la sogs sgra //
translated: The words excrement, urine, and so on

original: 'jig rten bstan bcos phyi rol byas //üîΩyul sogs rjod byed sangs rgyas kyis //
analyzed: 'jig rten bstan bcos phyi rol byas // yul sogs rjod byed sangs rgyas kyis //
translated: are taught as external treatises of the world.üîΩThe words of the objects and so on are taught

original: rgyud du bstan pa sgra min pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud du bstan pa sgra min pa'o //

original: sgra don kho na yi ge'i don //
analyzed: sgra don kho na yi ge'i don //

original: spyi yi don gyi dbye ba gnyis //
analyzed: spyi yi don gyi dbye ba gnyis //

original: nyan thos 'gyod pa spong ba dang // bskyed pa gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos 'gyod pa spong ba dang // bskyed pa gsal bar byed pa'o //

original: sbas pa rnam pa gsum du bshad //
analyzed: sbas pa rnam pa gsum du bshad //

original: 'dod chags chos dang kun rdzob bden //
analyzed: 'dod chags chos dang kun rdzob bden //

original: ye shes gsum po rnam brtags pa'i //
analyzed: ye shes gsum po rnam brtags pa'i //

original: snying po 'dir yod phyir des de'o //
analyzed: snying po 'dir yod phyir des de'o //

original: 'od gsal ba ni rab ston dang // zung du 'jug pa rab rtogs byed //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni rab ston dang // zung du 'jug pa rab rtogs byed //

original: mthar thug rnam pa gnyis rab brjod //
analyzed: mthar thug rnam pa gnyis rab brjod //
translated: The ultimate is said to be of two kinds.üîΩThe end is the word for the limit.

original: mtha' ni mur thug pa yi tshig / rigs lnga bskyed pa'i rgyud yin te //
analyzed: mtha' ni mur thug pa yi tshig / rigs lnga bskyed pa'i rgyud yin te //

original: rigs gcig gyur pa gleng gzhi yin //
analyzed: rigs gcig gyur pa gleng gzhi yin //
translated: is the nidana of the single family.üîΩThe vajra and so forth are the definitive words of the pair,

analyzed: rdo rje sogs zung nges pa'i tshig / sgeg pa yang ni rgyu ru 'dod //

original: ji bzhin sgra dang dgongs pa dang // de bzhin drang don bstan pa dang // yi ge'i don dang spyi yi don //
analyzed: ji bzhin sgra dang dgongs pa dang // de bzhin drang don bstan pa dang // yi ge'i don dang spyi yi don //
translated: the meaning of the syllables and the general meaning,

original: tshogs la bshad pa mngon du'o //
analyzed: tshogs la bshad pa mngon du'o //

original: ji bzhin min dang nges don dang // de bzhin kho nar dgongs bshad dang // sbas dang mthar thug pa yang ni //
analyzed: ji bzhin min dang nges don dang // de bzhin kho nar dgongs bshad dang // sbas dang mthar thug pa yang ni //
translated: The one who is not like that, the one with the definitive meaning, the one with the intention of just that, the one who is hidden, and the one who is ultimate

original: slob ma bshad pa yin par 'dod //
analyzed: slob ma bshad pa yin par 'dod //
translated: are said to be the explanations for the disciples.

original: dngos po ma lus thos nas de //
analyzed: dngos po ma lus thos nas de //

original: 'dzin pa la ni rnam par mkhas //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la ni rnam par mkhas //
translated: they are skilled in retaining them.

original: skad cig gis ni brjod 'gyur ba //
analyzed: skad cig gis ni brjod 'gyur ba //
translated: They are called the one who is momentary,

original: autpala zhes bya'i gang zag go //
analyzed: autpala zhes bya'i gang zag go //

original: gzung bya lhag par mang thos nas //
analyzed: gzung bya lhag par mang thos nas //

original: ston pa yi ni nus med pa //
analyzed: ston pa yi ni nus med pa //

original: bum pa'i ras bal sa bon bzhin //
analyzed: bum pa'i ras bal sa bon bzhin //

original: shes bya bang dkar gang zag brjod //
analyzed: shes bya bang dkar gang zag brjod //

original: dad dang ldan zhing snying rje shes //
analyzed: dad dang ldan zhing snying rje shes //

original: thos nas blo yi kha 'bye la //
analyzed: thos nas blo yi kha 'bye la //

original: tshigs med 'o ma bzhin 'dzag pa //
analyzed: tshigs med 'o ma bzhin 'dzag pa //

original: padma zhes bya'i gang zag ge //
analyzed: padma zhes bya'i gang zag ge //

original: @255b thos pa nying  zhing nga rgyal ldan //
analyzed: @255b thos pa nying  zhing nga rgyal ldan //

original: rtsa ba med par mang du sma //
analyzed: rtsa ba med par mang du sma //

original: rjes su gzung bar mi nus pa //
analyzed: rjes su gzung bar mi nus pa //

original: tsandan zhes bya'i gang zag go //
analyzed: tsandan zhes bya'i gang zag go //

original: tshul khrims bzang zhing mkhas la sgrin //
analyzed: tshul khrims bzang zhing mkhas la sgrin //

original: shes rab ldan zhing rgyud gcig pa //
analyzed: shes rab ldan zhing rgyud gcig pa //

original: thos nas legs par ston pa ni //
analyzed: thos nas legs par ston pa ni //

original: rin chen zhes bya'i gang zag go //
analyzed: rin chen zhes bya'i gang zag go //

original: gang zag bzhi po 'di rnams la //
analyzed: gang zag bzhi po 'di rnams la //

analyzed: tshogs pa bshad pa 'ba' zhig go //

original: rin chen gang zag rtog dpyod pa //
analyzed: rin chen gang zag rtog dpyod pa //

analyzed: slob ma la bshad snod yin no // bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //

original: phan don can gyi rgyud bstan bya //
analyzed: phan don can gyi rgyud bstan bya //

original: 'di nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams kun //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams kun //

original: drang bar bya'o gzhan du min //
analyzed: drang bar bya'o gzhan du min //

analyzed: zhes so // da ni slob ma rnams kyi don la the tshom gyis rab tu 'jug pa'i don du brjod bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //

analyzed: 'dir brjod bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'o //
translated: Here, the subject matter is the BhagavƒÅn Heruka, whose nature is wisdom and method.

original: 'di'i yang so sor rtogs par byed pa po rgyud kyi rgyal po mngon par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i yang so sor rtogs par byed pa po rgyud kyi rgyal po mngon par brjod pa'o //

analyzed: de dag phan tshun brjod bya rjod byed kyi mtshan nyid ni 'brel ba'o //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni dgos pa'o //

analyzed: phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa ni 'dir dogs pa'i dgos pa'o //

original: 'di rnams mngon par gzigs nas nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang bral ba'i gdul bya rnams kyi 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa'i bsam pas gsang chen gyi gnas kyi dpa' bo dang // dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i phag mos gsol ba btab pas sh'akya thub pas dpal he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rtsa ba'i rgyud mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa las gzhung tshad bdun brgya pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das bdag
analyzed: 'di rnams mngon par gzigs nas nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang bral ba'i gdul bya rnams kyi 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa'i bsam pas gsang chen gyi gnas kyi dpa' bo dang // dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i phag mos gsol ba btab pas sh'akya thub pas dpal he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rtsa ba'i rgyud mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa las gzhung tshad bdun brgya pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das bdag
translated: Having seen these, the request of Vajravarahi, surrounded by the heroes and heroines of the great secret abode, with the intention of enjoying the five desires of the disciples who are free from the bonds of the disciples, caused Shakyamuni to enter the samadhi of Shri Heruka and to teach the root Tantra, the one hundred thousand verse Abhidhana Tantra, from which the seven hundred verse Tantra was extracted.

original: las / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don skye ba 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid sbyin pa po yang dag par bstan to //
analyzed: las / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don skye ba 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid sbyin pa po yang dag par bstan to //
translated: The function is that the giver of Buddhahood in this very life, the mundane and supramundane aims, is taught.

original: da ni bsdus pa'i don la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni bsdus pa'i don la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the summary meaning and so forth should be stated.

analyzed: de la thog mar bzhugs pa'i gnas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang // de nas dam tshig gi spyod pa nyid kyis dang / ston pa po dang gsol ba 'debs pa po nyid kyis dang / rigs ldan ma'i don gyis dang / pho nya mo mchod pa nyid kyis dang /
translated: Therein, first, the nature of the abode of the Buddha is stated by the abode of the Buddha, and then, by the conduct of the commitments, the teacher and the supplicant, the meaning of the lady of the family, the worship of the messenger,

translated: the meditation of the desired attainment, the meaning of the worship of the thought of enlightenment, the complete liberation of all sins, the yoga of the three knowledges, the three vajras, the three realities, the three bodies, the three times, the three worlds, the three realms, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds, the three worlds

original: pa nyid sgrub pa'i thabs nyid kyis dang / dam tshig skyong ba nyid kyis dang / dam tshig bye ba bsrung ba nyid kyis dang / bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba nyid kyis dang / zla ba btung ba nyid kyis dang / dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyis dang /
analyzed: pa nyid sgrub pa'i thabs nyid kyis dang / dam tshig skyong ba nyid kyis dang / dam tshig bye ba bsrung ba nyid kyis dang / bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba nyid kyis dang / zla ba btung ba nyid kyis dang / dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyis dang /
translated: by the method of accomplishing the state of being a hero, by the method of protecting the commitments, by the method of protecting the one hundred and fifty commitments, by the method of eating the five nectars, by the method of drinking the moon, by the method of union with the two organs,

original: lha'i bde ba nyid bsngags pa nyid kyis dang / lha dang mi'i bde ba nyid bsngags pa nyid kyis gnas pa ste le'u dang po la'o //
analyzed: lha'i bde ba nyid bsngags pa nyid kyis dang / lha dang mi'i bde ba nyid bsngags pa nyid kyis gnas pa ste le'u dang po la'o //
translated: by the method of praising the bliss of the deity, and by the method of praising the bliss of gods and humans.

original: de nas ri la sogs pa'i gnas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de nas ri la sogs pa'i gnas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa ste /

analyzed: bla ma las ni dga' @258a * //

original: ba gnyis las so //
analyzed: ba gnyis las so //

original: bla ma ni khyad par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: bla ma ni khyad par dga' ba'o //

analyzed: de mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom ste rang bzhin can rnams kyi tshogs /

analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'o //

analyzed: gsang chen ni rdo rje lha mo'i gnas so //

original: mchog gi ni sbas pa'i dpe spangs pa'o //
analyzed: mchog gi ni sbas pa'i dpe spangs pa'o //

original: dgyes pa ni shes rab ma'i shin tu bde ba'o //
analyzed: dgyes pa ni shes rab ma'i shin tu bde ba'o //

analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid ni rgyal ba'i rang bzhin no //

analyzed: rtag tu gnas ni btsun mo'i 'khor du 'jug bzhin pa la'o //

analyzed: de nas 'di las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bar ma chad pa'o //

original: gsang chen ni thams cad stong pa'o //

analyzed: rgyas pa min las ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rtog pa las so //

original: dpal he ru ka mnyam par sbyor ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag snang ba med par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka mnyam par sbyor ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag snang ba med par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The union with glorious Heruka is the union of the two truths, the conventional and the ultimate, in the absence of appearance.

original: bla ma las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam las so //
analyzed: bla ma las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam las so //

original: bla ma ni shes rab dang thabs kyi de nyid do //
analyzed: bla ma ni shes rab dang thabs kyi de nyid do //

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom ni chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom ni chos kyi sku'o //

original: gsang chen ni thams cad 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: gsang chen ni thams cad 'dus pa'o //

original: mchog gi ni chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: mchog gi ni chos kyi dbyings so //

original: dgyes pa ni stong pa chen po la'o //
analyzed: dgyes pa ni stong pa chen po la'o //

original: thams cad bdag nyid ni shin tu stong pa la'o //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid ni shin tu stong pa la'o //

original: rtag tu gnas ni stong pa la ste thabs shes rab kyi gzugs kyis dus gsum du 'khor ba'i bar du gnas te rten dang brten pa dag gcig dag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rtag tu gnas ni stong pa la ste thabs shes rab kyi gzugs kyis dus gsum du 'khor ba'i bar du gnas te rten dang brten pa dag gcig dag nyid kyis so //
translated: The always abiding is in emptiness, abiding in the form of wisdom and means for as long as samsara lasts, by the oneness of the supported and the support.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug lus //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug lus //

original: thams cad gzugs kyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: thams cad gzugs kyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: All are adorned with form.üîΩThus, the abode is always the Blessed Lady, the Great Illusion, the one who practices austerities.

original: zhes so // de bzhin du rtag tu gnas ni bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu 'phrul chen po dka' bar spyod ma stong pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa rnam par spang ba'o zhes so //üîΩmthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de bzhin du rtag tu gnas ni bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu 'phrul chen po dka' bar spyod ma stong pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa rnam par spang ba'o zhes so // mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The ultimate is the equality of space, the abandonment of entity and non-entity.

original: da ni dam tshig gi spyod pa nus pa nan tan du byed pa'i don du gsungs /
analyzed: da ni dam tshig gi spyod pa nus pa nan tan du byed pa'i don du gsungs /
translated: Now, in order to emphasize the practice of the commitments, it is said:

original: sems dpa' pho nya kun rang bzhin //
analyzed: sems dpa' pho nya kun rang bzhin //

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog //

original: 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das //

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //

original: sgra yi tshul las rnam nges 'byung //
analyzed: sgra yi tshul las rnam nges 'byung //

original: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul lo //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul lo //

original: zhes te pho nya mo ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams thams cad do //
analyzed: zhes te pho nya mo ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams thams cad do //
translated: The messenger is all the factors of enlightenment.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni chos kyi sku ste dag pa'i ye shes dang rnam par shes pa'i @258b mtshan nyid gzhan gyi don byed pa po'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni chos kyi sku ste dag pa'i ye shes dang rnam par shes pa'i @258b mtshan nyid gzhan gyi don byed pa po'o //
translated: Its nature is the dharmakƒÅya, the pure pristine consciousness, and the characteristic of consciousness is the agent of benefit for others.üîΩThe sattva is the characteristic of the three realms.

original: sems dpa' ni khams gsum pa'i mtshan nyid de bshad pa'i rgyud du yang /
analyzed: sems dpa' ni khams gsum pa'i mtshan nyid de bshad pa'i rgyud du yang /
translated: In the explanatory tantra,

original: sems can dag ni g-yo bar bshad //
analyzed: sems can dag ni g-yo bar bshad //

original: snod ni brtan pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: snod ni brtan pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The vessel is stable, and so on.

original: zhes so // rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bshad /
analyzed: zhes so // rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bshad /

original: de kho na bde ba'i mchog ste lhan cig skyes pa'i sku shes rab dang thabs rang gi don byed pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na bde ba'i mchog ste lhan cig skyes pa'i sku shes rab dang thabs rang gi don byed pa'o //
translated: That is the supreme bliss, the innate body, the agent of one‚Äôs own benefit, and the method of wisdom.

analyzed: ma 'dres pa la sogs pa chos sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //

analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i chos 'di dag gi rnal 'byor pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The yogin of these innate qualities is Vajrasattva, the one who is truly joined.

original: 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das ni de kho na tshangs pa sku'i rdo rje 'dzin te sprul pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das ni de kho na tshangs pa sku'i rdo rje 'dzin te sprul pa'i sku'o //
translated: The Blessed One, the Self-Arisen, is the Holder of the Vajra of the Body of Reality, the Emanation Body.

original: gzugs kun nas gsal ba'i phyir bcom ldan te gzugs phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir te gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gzugs kun nas gsal ba'i phyir bcom ldan te gzugs phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir te gsungs pa yang /
translated: He is the Blessed One because of the manifestation of all forms, because of the possession of the perfection of form and so on. It is also said:

original: phun tshogs gzugs dang dbang phyug nyid //
analyzed: phun tshogs gzugs dang dbang phyug nyid //
translated: The perfection of form and mastery,

original: de bzhin brtson dang grags pa ste //
analyzed: de bzhin brtson dang grags pa ste //

original: 'bras bu 'di bzhi ston pa yi //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'di bzhi ston pa yi //

analyzed: bsod nams phung po'i mthu las so // mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom pa ni de kho na rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: through the power of the mass of merit.

original: dbang bskur ba'i sangs rgyas su blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i sangs rgyas su blta bar bya'o //
translated: The binding of the dakinis' net is to be seen as the consecration Buddha, because of the possession of all the aspects of reality.

original: sgra'i tshul ni sngags kyi sku ste 'di las gsum yang dag par sbyor ba las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gzhom du med pa'i sgra'o //
analyzed: sgra'i tshul ni sngags kyi sku ste 'di las gsum yang dag par sbyor ba las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gzhom du med pa'i sgra'o //
translated: The way of sound is the mantra body, from which the enjoyment body is the indestructible sound of the union of the three.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul du yang //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul du yang //
translated: In the way of the perfections,

original: dper na rnga las ma brdungs pa //
analyzed: dper na rnga las ma brdungs pa //

original: sgra ni kun du 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sgra ni kun du 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: arises without being beaten.

original: de bzhin rgyal ba'ang lhun grub tu //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyal ba'ang lhun grub tu //
translated: In the same way, the Victorious One

original: ston par byed pa nyid du 'byung //
analyzed: ston par byed pa nyid du 'byung //
translated: appears as a teacher spontaneously.

original: rnam nges 'byung ni sngags kyi lha nyid de yang 'jig rten gsum nyid du nges par phyung ste gdul ba rnams la sgra kun du gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam nges 'byung ni sngags kyi lha nyid de yang 'jig rten gsum nyid du nges par phyung ste gdul ba rnams la sgra kun du gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The arising of the ascertainment is the deity of the mantra. That also arises as the ascertainment of the three worlds, because the sound is clear to the disciples.

original: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul ni lus 'di nyid dam tshig gi spyod pa'i yul du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul ni lus 'di nyid dam tshig gi spyod pa'i yul du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: The domain of the conduct of the sacred pledge is the yoginƒ´, because this very body is realized as the domain of the conduct of the sacred pledge.

original: dam tshig gi spyod pa ni 'chang bzhin par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi spyod pa ni 'chang bzhin par brjod par bya'o //
translated: The conduct of the sacred pledge should be expressed as ‚Äúbearing.‚Äù

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: gzhan la thabs kyis byed pa ni //
analyzed: gzhan la thabs kyis byed pa ni //
translated: The one who acts with skillful means for others

original: de bzhin kho na 'gro ba'i gnyen //
analyzed: de bzhin kho na 'gro ba'i gnyen //
translated: is the friend of migrating beings just like that.

original: go 'phang 'phags pa'i spyod yul thob //
analyzed: go 'phang 'phags pa'i spyod yul thob //
translated: Having attained the state of the domain of the noble ones,

original: byis pa'i spyod yul blta bar bya //
analyzed: byis pa'i spyod yul blta bar bya //
translated: one should view the domain of the childish.

original: zhes so // dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is the commentary.

original: ston pa po dang @259a * //
analyzed: ston pa po dang @259a * //
translated: The teacher

original: gsol ba 'debs pa po brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gsol ba 'debs pa po brjod par bya ste /
translated: The one who makes the request should be described:

original: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par dka' //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par dka' //
translated: Difficult to attain in the three worlds,

original: thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag gnas //
analyzed: thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag gnas //
translated: perfectly abiding in beginning, middle, and end,

original: bsrub bya srub byed sbyor ba las //
analyzed: bsrub bya srub byed sbyor ba las //
translated: from the union of the churned and the churner,

original: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //
analyzed: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //

original: 'di ni ye shes dang / thugs dang / gsung dang / sku gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa gtsang zhing dag pa'i gzugs rang bzhin dang / chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa rnams kyis tha dad du 'jug pa can thams cad stong pa dbyings kyi ngo bo can no //
analyzed: 'di ni ye shes dang / thugs dang / gsung dang / sku gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa gtsang zhing dag pa'i gzugs rang bzhin dang / chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa rnams kyis tha dad du 'jug pa can thams cad stong pa dbyings kyi ngo bo can no //
translated: This is the single indivisible essence of wisdom, mind, speech, and body, pure and clean, with the nature of emptiness, the essence of space, engaging in the distinctions of natural, dharma, enjoyment, and emanation bodies.

original: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par dka' ni bsod nams dman pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par dka' ni bsod nams dman pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: Difficult to attain in the three worlds is for those with little merit.

original: thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag gnas ni chos thams cad la dus gsum du yang dag gnas pa yang ngo //
analyzed: thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag gnas ni chos thams cad la dus gsum du yang dag gnas pa yang ngo //
translated: Perfectly abiding in beginning, middle, and end is also the perfect abiding of all phenomena in the three times.

original: de bzhin du yang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bral ba rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bral ba rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'o //
translated: Likewise, it is not the domain of those devoid of the accumulation of wisdom.

original: dgongs pa pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not the domain of those without realization.

original: bsrub bya srub byed sbyor ba las ni rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang /üîΩbsrub bya chos 'byung du bshad do //
analyzed: bsrub bya srub byed sbyor ba las ni rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang / bsrub bya chos 'byung du bshad do //
translated: In the Vajradaka, the object of friction and the agent of friction are explained as the source of phenomena.

original: srub byed rdo rjer brjod par bya //
analyzed: srub byed rdo rjer brjod par bya //
translated: The agent of friction is said to be the vajra.

original: sbyor ba dbyings dang ye shes yin //
analyzed: sbyor ba dbyings dang ye shes yin //
translated: The union is the realm and pristine consciousness.

original: bdud rtsi lta bur mchog tu 'byung //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lta bur mchog tu 'byung //
translated: It arises as supreme, like nectar.

original: dngos su sangs rgyas nyid du byed //üîΩces gsungs so //üîΩbsam gtan la sogs kyi sgra dag las /
analyzed: dngos su sangs rgyas nyid du byed // ces gsungs so // bsam gtan la sogs kyi sgra dag las /
translated: It actually produces buddhahood itself.üîΩFrom the words such as ‚Äúmeditation,‚Äù

original: bsam gtan gyi sogs kyis kyang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi sogs kyis kyang /
translated: and so on,üîΩthis is definitely taught in the words such as ‚Äúmeditation.‚Äù

original: 'di nyid du nges par ston pa'i bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / gtor ma dang / bsam gtan dang / bza' ba dang btung ba rnams kyis bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid du nges par ston pa'i bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / gtor ma dang / bsam gtan dang / bza' ba dang btung ba rnams kyis bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: It is accomplished by the recitation, fire puja, bali, meditation, food, and drink.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du thun mtshams kyi dbye bas bzhi'o //

analyzed: thun gyi dbye bas brgyad mchod par bya'o zhes so //

analyzed: gang gi phyir phyi rol gyi gnas la sogs par dkyil 'khor du dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lor de rnams kun du spyod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the ones who enjoy the mandala in the external places, etc., and the ga·πáacakra.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn has said:

original: gnas la sogs pa de rnams su /
analyzed: gnas la sogs pa de rnams su /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa rnam par dag pa khams rnams lha'i gzugs kyis 'byon pa 'am gshegs pa ni 'das pa'i dus su byung ngo //

original: da ltar 'byung ngo //
analyzed: da ltar 'byung ngo //

analyzed: ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dri ma med pa'i 'od du'o //

analyzed: kha sbyor gyi rgyud du gsum nges par bstan te /

original: snga ma 'gog pa dang phyi ma skye bas /

analyzed: 'dir yang 'chi ba'i @261b mthar skye ba'i cha shas can gyi chos su shes par bya'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir yang na longs spyod pa dang / thim pa rnam pa gnyis so zhes so //

analyzed: gsungs pa yang dbang byed pa ni gnas pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid longs spyod pa ste bdag po nyid kyang ngo //

original: thim pa zhes pa ni 'gro bar bya ba'i gnas la'o //
analyzed: thim pa zhes pa ni 'gro bar bya ba'i gnas la'o //

original: da ltar ba la longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar ba la longs spyod pa'o //

analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus la thim pa'o zhes grub po //

analyzed: rigs ldan ma rnams dus thams cad du mchod par bya'o //

analyzed: chu srin gyi 'pho ba la shar gyi zhal 'byung ba ni /

original: ji skad gsungs pa'i gnas su /
analyzed: ji skad gsungs pa'i gnas su /

analyzed: rdul tshon rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bris te gsad pa'i don du mkha' 'gro ma la mchod yon byin nas me tog la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
translated: one should draw the ma·πá·∏çala with colored powders. Having offered a libation to the ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´ for the sake of killing, one should make offerings with flowers, and so on.

original: de bzhin du sa ga can la sogs pa la dbang du bya ba'i don du nyi ma gung la l'a ma'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sa ga can la sogs pa la dbang du bya ba'i don du nyi ma gung la l'a ma'o //

analyzed: karka ta la sogs pa la rengs pa'i don du phyem reng dum skyes ma la'o //

analyzed: slar yang mchu can la sogs pa la skrod pa'i don du khva gdong ma la'o //

analyzed: snon can gyi phyed la rgyas pa'i don du phag gdong ma la'o //

analyzed: chu stod can la sogs pa la dug gzhil ba'i don du gshin rje sreg ma la'o //

original: khrums can gyi phyed la rmongs pa'i don du gshin rje pho nya ma la'o //üîΩsmin drug can la sogs pa la rengs pa'i ched du gshin rje mche ba ma la'o //
analyzed: khrums can gyi phyed la rmongs pa'i don du gshin rje pho nya ma la'o // smin drug can la sogs pa la rengs pa'i ched du gshin rje mche ba ma la'o //

analyzed: mgo can gyi phyed la rnam par dbye ba'i don du gshin rje 'joms ma la ste zla ba phyed pa dang zla ba dang / ji srid thun brgyad kyi dbye bas ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas mchod par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of dividing, on the half-day of the head, [one should worship] YamajihvƒÅ. One should worship with the prescribed rite for as long as eight watches, by the division of the half-month, the month, and so on.

original: ji ltar thun mtshams bzhir mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa mchod pa de bzhin du rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams phyogs kyi dbye bas mchod do zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar thun mtshams bzhir mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa mchod pa de bzhin du rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams phyogs kyi dbye bas mchod do zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Just as one worships the dakinis and so forth in the four periods of the day, so one should understand that one worships the twenty-four goddesses such as Pracha·πá·∏çƒÅ, by the division of the directions.

original: de bzhin du tshogs kyi 'khor lor yang ming gi sngags kyis mchod nas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod @262a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshogs kyi 'khor lor yang ming gi sngags kyis mchod nas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod @262a * //
translated: In the same way, in the ganacakra one should worship with the mantras of the names, and one should perform the conduct of the yoginis.

original: pa bya ste shes rab dang thabs kyi dbye bas longs spyod pa'i dus la bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'khrig pa dang myang bas rnal 'byor ma mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: pa bya ste shes rab dang thabs kyi dbye bas longs spyod pa'i dus la bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'khrig pa dang myang bas rnal 'byor ma mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should worship the yoginis with food, drink, sex, and tasting, at the time of enjoyment, by the division of wisdom and means.

analyzed: 'dir gang dang gang du 'gro ba der lhag ma la sogs pa za bas de dang de'i rigs su 'gyur te tshur 'ong gi bar du'o //

analyzed: dper na rgyas pa la sogs pa'i rigs kha ton la sogs pas bram zer 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma rnams kyang rigs ma yin pa rnams /

analyzed: rigs dang rigs kyang ma yin pa //

original: zhes gsungs te gang du bzhi yod pa der thun mtshams kyi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs te gang du bzhi yod pa der thun mtshams kyi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //

original: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du yang rnal 'byor pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs te shes rab kyi rgyud kyi dgongs pas rnal 'byor kyi  rgyud rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du yang rnal 'byor pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs te shes rab kyi rgyud kyi dgongs pas rnal 'byor kyi  rgyud rtogs par bya'o //

original: rtsa ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa'i don to //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa'i don to //

original: de bzhin du rnal 'byor rgyud du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnal 'byor rgyud du gsungs pa /

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du dam tshig shes par bya'o //
translated: In the Yogini Tantra, the commitments are to be understood.

original: de bzhin du gang du brgyad yin pa der thun gyi dbye bas nyi ma'i cha la mtshan mo phyed nas nyi ma gang ji srid par bzhi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gang du brgyad yin pa der thun gyi dbye bas nyi ma'i cha la mtshan mo phyed nas nyi ma gang ji srid par bzhi'o //
translated: Similarly, where there are eight, there are four from midnight until sunrise, divided into sessions.

analyzed: de bzhin du zla ba'i cha la yang bzhi'o //

original: 'di ltar mtshan mo dang nyin mo mnyam pa'i thun mtshams las so //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan mo dang nyin mo mnyam pa'i thun mtshams las so //
translated: Thus, from the equal part of night and day.

analyzed: gang du bcu drug yod pa der thun phyed pa dbye bas so //

analyzed: gang du sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa der yud tsam gyi dbye bas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs par bya'o zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, it should be understood.

original: dus khyad par gyis zhes pa gang du srog dbang du byed cing byin gyis brlabs pa der de'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang ldan pa phreng ba la sogs pa'i sngags srog 'bab pas mchod par bya zhing /

analyzed: bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //

original: de bzhin du sku'i 'khor lo la gnas pa brgyad ni sa 'og gi dngos grub ster ba po nyid yin pa'i phyir tha ma'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sku'i 'khor lo la gnas pa brgyad ni sa 'og gi dngos grub ster ba po nyid yin pa'i phyir tha ma'o //
translated: Thus, the eight abiding in the body wheel are the last, because they are the bestowers of the powers of the underworld.

analyzed: khra gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyang yi dags dang dud 'gro'i dngos grub ster ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The eight beginning with Kha·πá·∏çarohƒÅ are also bestowers of the accomplishments of ghosts and animals.

original: de bzhin du sa la spyod pa brgyad ni rgyal srid la sogs pa'i dngos grub ster bas 'bring ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du sa la spyod pa brgyad ni rgyal srid la sogs pa'i dngos grub ster bas 'bring ngo //
translated: Similarly, the eight who move on the earth are middling, bestowing the accomplishments of kingship, etc.

original: de bzhin du mkha' la spyod pa brgyad ni 'dod pa na @262b spyod pa'i dngos grub ster bas mchog ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du mkha' la spyod pa brgyad ni 'dod pa na @262b spyod pa'i dngos grub ster bas mchog ste /
translated: Similarly, the eight who move in the sky are supreme, bestowing the accomplishments of the desire realm.

original: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyang gzugs na spyod pa'i dngos grub ster ro //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyang gzugs na spyod pa'i dngos grub ster ro //
translated: The ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´s, etc., also bestow the accomplishments of the form realm.

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten pa'i bden pas bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de thams cad 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu de ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten pa'i bden pas bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de thams cad 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu de ci zhe na /
translated: Thus, all that is to be accomplished by mundane truth is a mundane result.

original: des bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: What is that? It is not buddhahood, since it is accomplished by that.

original: 'di'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For this reason, it is said:

original: yid ni nang du chud pa yis /
analyzed: yid ni nang du chud pa yis /
translated: By the mind being inwardly focused,

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub de bsgom bya //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub de bsgom bya //

original: zhes pa phyag rgya chen mo'i don du'o //
analyzed: zhes pa phyag rgya chen mo'i don du'o //

original: 'di'i tshig snga ma la sogs pa ni dpal 'dus pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga par gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i tshig snga ma la sogs pa ni dpal 'dus pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga par gsungs pa /
translated: The earlier words of this verse are spoken in the glorious twenty-five thousand line version of the Guhyasamaja Tantra:

original: rdo rje skyil krung gis sems ni /
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung gis sems ni /
translated: The mind in vajra posture,

original: nor bu'i nang du chud pa lta //
analyzed: nor bu'i nang du chud pa lta //
translated: like a gem in the center,

original: rgyu mthun la sogs bde ba rdzogs //
analyzed: rgyu mthun la sogs bde ba rdzogs //
translated: perfected in bliss, such as the natural outflow,

original: dri med nyid par kho nar de'o //
analyzed: dri med nyid par kho nar de'o //
translated: and so forth, is just stainless.

original: zhes so // des na rdo rje skyil krung ni bha gar lingga bzhag nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje nor bu'i nang du chud pa ni yid ni nang du chud pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // des na rdo rje skyil krung ni bha gar lingga bzhag nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje nor bu'i nang du chud pa ni yid ni nang du chud pa'o //

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i sems nang du chud pa des /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i sems nang du chud pa des /
translated: By the mind of innate joy being in the center,

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub phyag rgya chen mo rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang / snying rje'i snying po can bde ba chen po'i thabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub phyag rgya chen mo rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang / snying rje'i snying po can bde ba chen po'i thabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the great seal of the desired power, emptiness endowed with all supreme aspects, and the method of great bliss with the essence of compassion, having become a single taste.

original: nyi ma'i snang ba ye shes kyi phyag rgya la dmigs pa zung du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i snang ba ye shes kyi phyag rgya la dmigs pa zung du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes pa'o //
translated: The yogi who focuses on the seal of pristine awareness, the light of the sun, is called ‚Äúthe one who has entered the union.‚Äù

original: ji srid du nor bu'i rtse mo nas spyi bor dri ma med pa nyid thob par gyur pa de srid du mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba de bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid du nor bu'i rtse mo nas spyi bor dri ma med pa nyid thob par gyur pa de srid du mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba de bsgom par bya'o //
translated: For as long as the yogi attains the state of stainlessness from the tip of the jewel to the crown of the head, for that long he should meditate on unchanging bliss.

original: de las rnal 'byor pa brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams kyis skye ba 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid do zhes so //
analyzed: de las rnal 'byor pa brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams kyis skye ba 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid do zhes so //

original: dbang mdor bstan par yang /
analyzed: dbang mdor bstan par yang /

analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug dang // ye shes phyag rgya sogs dmigs dang // phyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas //

analyzed: mi 'gyur ba de 'phel bar byed //

analyzed: ces so // ji srid byang chub sems 'dor ba //

analyzed: skye gnas las thob rgyun ma chad //

original: de srid du ni rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: de srid du ni rnal 'byor pas //

analyzed: mi bya kun du dga' ba mchog //

analyzed: bde ba'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis //

original: ji srid khu ba brtan gyur pa //
analyzed: ji srid khu ba brtan gyur pa //

original: bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya //

analyzed: lte bar rgyu mthun nyid du brjod //

original: snying gar rnam par smin par dran //
analyzed: snying gar rnam par smin par dran //

original: mgrin par skyes bu byed pa nyid //
analyzed: mgrin par skyes bu byed pa nyid //

original: gsungs so // skya rengs 'char ba'i dus dag tu //

analyzed: zla ba nya la des bsgrub bya //

analyzed: skye dgu'i bdag po'am rnal 'byor pas so //

translated: The yogƒ´ of imagination, by the consecration of the yoga of the great practice, should worship with the taste of his own substances, the drops, in order to bless the mind that is attached to the mudrƒÅ that is to be meditated upon.

analyzed: mchod pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: rang rdzas mdzes pa nyid kyi rdzas //
translated: The substance of one's own beautiful substance,üîΩBy the cause of emptiness, utter emptiness,

analyzed: thams cad stong pa mngon sum du // byas las bde chen skad cig gis //

analyzed: mchod par bya phyir rdzogs par bya //

original: zhes so // mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // mthar thug pa'o //

analyzed: thig le'i mchod pa'o //

analyzed: da ni 'di'i 'bras bu gsungs pa //

analyzed: aom a'a: h'um ho ham ksha: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang lte ba dang gtsug tor dang gsang ba rnams su dgod par bya'o //

original: sa bdun pa'i dbang po nyid /
analyzed: sa bdun pa'i dbang po nyid /

analyzed: de nas sa brgyad pa'i dbang po nyid /

original: spyod dus su yang /
analyzed: spyod dus su yang /

analyzed: de bzhin du gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i sngags pas brgyad pa'i dbang phyug ces so // yang na sa bcu pa'i dbang po nyid de rang byin gyis brlab pa'i ye shes las skyes pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa nyid kyang sgrub par byed do zhes pa'i don ni sgrub pa'i phyir zhes
translated: Likewise, the mantrin abiding in the vajra speech meditative stabilization is the lord of the eighth,

original: ki li ki li si li si li hi li hi li dhi li dhi li hum h'um phat /
analyzed: ki li ki li si li si li hi li hi li dhi li dhi li hum h'um phat /

original: zhes pa rkang pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa rkang pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra of the twenty-four-line verse.

original: yi ge'i grangs steng du ni dgu bcu rtsa bdun no //
analyzed: yi ge'i grangs steng du ni dgu bcu rtsa bdun no //
translated: The number of syllables is ninety-seven.

original: phyi ma la yang brgya'o //
analyzed: phyi ma la yang brgya'o //
translated: The next [mantra] is also one hundred.

original: aom yig la sogs pa nas hum h'um phat kyi yi ge'i mthar thug pa rtsa ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom yig la sogs pa nas hum h'um phat kyi yi ge'i mthar thug pa rtsa ba'i sngags so //
translated: The root mantra is from the syllable Om up to the syllable Hum hum phat.

original: de bzhin du yang snying po la sogs pa'i sngags kyang shes rab dang thabs la sogs pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang snying po la sogs pa'i sngags kyang shes rab dang thabs la sogs pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, the essence mantra and so forth should be understood by means of wisdom, method, and so on.

original: 'di rnams kyi rab tu @264b brjod pa'i bzlas pas so //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi rab tu @264b brjod pa'i bzlas pas so //
translated: By the recitation of their expression.

original: bsam gtan gyis kyang ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa'i bsam gtan gyis so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis kyang ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa'i bsam gtan gyis so //
translated: Also by means of concentration, by the concentration of conceptualization of the mandala wheel and so on.

original: kyang yig las phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang gtor ma sbyin pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: kyang yig las phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang gtor ma sbyin pas kyang ngo //
translated: Also by means of the external fire sacrifice, the wheel of the feast, and the giving of the sacrificial cake, due to the word also.

original: bde ba yis kyang ni las kyi phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i 'gyur ba dang g-yo ba'i bde bas so //
analyzed: bde ba yis kyang ni las kyi phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i 'gyur ba dang g-yo ba'i bde bas so //
translated: By happiness is meant the happiness of the change and movement of the karmamudra and the jnanamudra.

original: kyang yig las dam tshig bskyang bas 'og min gyi srid pa'i mthar thug pa'i bdag po la bcu gnyis rnams kyis 'di nyid kho nar 'grub par byed do zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: kyang yig las dam tshig bskyang bas 'og min gyi srid pa'i mthar thug pa'i bdag po la bcu gnyis rnams kyis 'di nyid kho nar 'grub par byed do zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
translated: By also is meant that by maintaining the vow, one will accomplish this very state of Vajradhara, up to the end of existence in Akanistha, with the twelve. This is the interpretable meaning explanation.

original: rnal 'byor pa nyid ni rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa nyid ni rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
translated: The yogin is Vajradhara himself.

original: de nyid kho na mchog ste gnyis su med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kho na mchog ste gnyis su med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: That very state is supreme, which is the nondual, perfect enlightenment.

original: bsod nams ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bsod nams ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: By merit is meant the perfection of the accumulation of merit.

original: dag byed ni ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dag byed ni ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: By purifier is meant the perfection of the accumulation of wisdom.

original: sdig pa 'jig byed pa ni tshul khrims kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sdig pa 'jig byed pa ni tshul khrims kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: By destroyer of evil is meant the perfection of the accumulation of morality.

original: sngags bzlas pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas rim pa min pas gsungs pa'i yan lag gsum gyis yan lag drug po rnams rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: sngags bzlas pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas rim pa min pas gsungs pa'i yan lag gsum gyis yan lag drug po rnams rtogs par bya ste /
translated: The three branches taught out of order, mantra repetition, and so forth, should be understood as the six branches.

original: de rnams kyis kyang bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should also practice with those.

original: byis pa las dang po pa rnams kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa la yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: byis pa las dang po pa rnams kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa la yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also taught for the accomplishment of the desired powers by beginners.

original: 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pas yan lag drug gi sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pas yan lag drug gi sgrub thabs so //
translated: The six-branch practice is by the enjoyment of the desired.

original: 'dir phyag rgya chen mo'i sgo nas yan lag drug brjod par bya ste /üîΩdpal 'dus pa phyi mar yang /
analyzed: 'dir phyag rgya chen mo'i sgo nas yan lag drug brjod par bya ste / dpal 'dus pa phyi mar yang /
translated: Here, the six branches should be stated from the perspective of the great seal.

original: mchog gi yan lag drug rnams kyis //üîΩzhes so // de nyid du gsungs pa /
analyzed: mchog gi yan lag drug rnams kyis // zhes so // de nyid du gsungs pa /
translated: Also, in the glorious Guhyasamaja, it says, By the six supreme branches...

original: sor sdud de bzhin bsam gtan dang // srog rtsol de nas 'dzin pa dang // rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
analyzed: sor sdud de bzhin bsam gtan dang // srog rtsol de nas 'dzin pa dang // rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
translated: And in that very tantra it says, withdrawal, meditative concentration, vitality control, retention, recollection, and samadhi

original: rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dod //
analyzed: rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dod //
translated: are asserted as the six branches of yoga.

original: dpal dus kyi 'khor lor yang nges par bstan pa /
analyzed: dpal dus kyi 'khor lor yang nges par bstan pa /
translated: And in the glorious Kalachakra, it is also taught:üîΩThe six branches are the six transcendent perfections.

original: so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o //
translated: In the withdrawal of the body, the ten objects and subjects do not engage.

original: bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa dga' dang g-yo med bde brtse gcig sems pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa dga' dang g-yo med bde brtse gcig sems pa'o //
translated: The concentrations are the one-pointed mind of wisdom, investigation, analysis, joy, and non-wavering bliss.

original: srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam na gnyis po bsgyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam na gnyis po bsgyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The life-force energy enters the central channel, and the two energies are overturned in the path.

original: thig ler srog ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: thig ler srog ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The life-force energy enters the bindu, and the two energies are destroyed, and the one-pointed mind is held.

original: gtum mo'i snang @265a * //
analyzed: gtum mo'i snang @265a * //
translated: The appearance of ca·πá·∏çƒÅlƒ´

original: bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur //
analyzed: bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur //
translated: is definitely recalled in the body and in space.

original: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin //
translated: By the nature of wisdom and method, the form of gnosis is samƒÅdhi through the power of unchanging bliss.

original: zhes so // 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: The extensive explanation of this is stated:

original: 'dir so sor sdud pa zhes bya ba ni lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams kyi 'brel pas rnam par shes pa rab tu 'jug pa med pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir so sor sdud pa zhes bya ba ni lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams kyi 'brel pas rnam par shes pa rab tu 'jug pa med pa ste /
translated: Here, the so-called withdrawal is the non-engagement of consciousness due to the connection of the ten objects and subjects in the body.

original: stong pa'i gzugs kyi yul rnams la gzhan mig la sogs pa rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa'i gzugs kyi yul rnams la gzhan mig la sogs pa rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is the engagement of the five kinds, such as the eye, etc., in the objects of empty form.

original: sha la sogs pa'i mig rnams kyis stong pa nyid la dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sha la sogs pa'i mig rnams kyis stong pa nyid la dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the eyes of flesh, etc., will observe emptiness.

original: de nas de nyid la blta ba ni shes rab po //
analyzed: de nas de nyid la blta ba ni shes rab po //
translated: Then, the view of that is wisdom.

original: rtog pa ni sems kyi dngos po 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa ni sems kyi dngos po 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Imagination is the apprehension of the entity of mind.

original: dpyod pa ni de'i don nges pa'o //
analyzed: dpyod pa ni de'i don nges pa'o //
translated: Analysis is the ascertainment of its meaning.

original: dga' ba ni gzugs la chags pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni gzugs la chags pa'o //
translated: Joy is attachment to form.

original: g-yo med bde ba ni stong pa nyid dang lhan cig sems gcig tu byed pa g-yo med bde ba mchog las bsgom pa zhes pa bsam gtan yan lag lnga'o //
analyzed: g-yo med bde ba ni stong pa nyid dang lhan cig sems gcig tu byed pa g-yo med bde ba mchog las bsgom pa zhes pa bsam gtan yan lag lnga'o //
translated: The five branches of concentration are non-wavering bliss, supreme non-wavering bliss, meditation, and so on.

original: de nas srog gi rtsol ba zhes pa g-yon pa dang / g-yas pa'i lam bsgyel bas cig car nyid du 'bab pa ste sems kyis bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: de nas srog gi rtsol ba zhes pa g-yon pa dang / g-yas pa'i lam bsgyel bas cig car nyid du 'bab pa ste sems kyis bzlas pa'o //
translated: Then, the ‚Äúlife-force and exertion‚Äù is the simultaneous descent of the life-force and exertion into the central channel by reversing the left and right paths, which is the mental recitation.

original: de nas 'dzin pa zhes pa thig ler te dpral bar srog ni rab tu zhugs shing phyi rol du rgyu ba med par yang dag par sdom pa'o //
analyzed: de nas 'dzin pa zhes pa thig ler te dpral bar srog ni rab tu zhugs shing phyi rol du rgyu ba med par yang dag par sdom pa'o //
translated: Then, the ‚Äúretention‚Äù is the retention of the life-force in the drop at the forehead, without external movement.

original: de nas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba rang gi 'dod pa'i lha mthong ba rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //üîΩde nas ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba shes rab rang gi sems kyis so sor snang ba des lhan cig pa'i mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i go 'phang thong /
analyzed: de nas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba rang gi 'dod pa'i lha mthong ba rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o // de nas ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba shes rab rang gi sems kyis so sor snang ba des lhan cig pa'i mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i go 'phang thong /
translated: Then, the ‚Äúrecollection‚Äù is the vision of one‚Äôs desired deity, free from conceptuality.üîΩThen, the ‚Äúconcentration‚Äù is the attainment of the state of unchanging bliss by one‚Äôs mind of wisdom, which is the appearance of the mind free from the subject-object dichotomy, due to the absence of all obscurations.

original: pa sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i sems zhi ba'i bde ba chen po zhes pa yan lag drug gi sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: pa sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i sems zhi ba'i bde ba chen po zhes pa yan lag drug gi sgrub thabs so //
translated: This is the method of the six-branched yoga.

original: 'bras bu ni dpal dus kyi 'khor lor gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni dpal dus kyi 'khor lor gsungs pa /
translated: The result is stated in the glorious KƒÅlacakra:

original: so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob /
analyzed: so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob /
translated: The yogi/nƒ´, by means of withdrawal, is free from objects and is blessed by all mantras.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o //
translated: He/she attains the five superknowledges, O King, through the purity of the application of meditative concentration.

original: srog gi rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod /
analyzed: srog gi rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod /
translated: Through the purity of life-force control, free from the moon and sun, the bodhisattvas make offerings.

original: bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu @265b la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis so //
analyzed: bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu @265b la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis so //
translated: The mƒÅras, afflictions, and so on, are destroyed and one enters into the ten powers through the power of retention.

original: rjes su dran pa'i legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa'i legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so //
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala of stainless light is well purified by the perfect purity of recollection, which is the form of gnosis.

original: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Then, through the purity of meditative concentration, the gnosis body is accomplished in a few days.

original: zhes so // lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa phyag rgya chen po sgom pa so sor sdud pas bcu drug las yongs su rdzogs pa'am /
analyzed: zhes so // lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa phyag rgya chen po sgom pa so sor sdud pas bcu drug las yongs su rdzogs pa'am /
translated: The meditation on mahƒÅmudrƒÅ endowed with deity yoga is completely perfected through the sixteen aspects of withdrawal.

original: gang gi tshe lo phyed kyis gzung bya sems dang / 'dzin pa po'i sems brtan par gyur pa de'i tshe tshig gi mchod sbyin pa la sogs pa sbyin par byed de sha'i mig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe lo phyed kyis gzung bya sems dang / 'dzin pa po'i sems brtan par gyur pa de'i tshe tshig gi mchod sbyin pa la sogs pa sbyin par byed de sha'i mig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: When the object of observation and the observing mind are stabilized by half a year, then one should give the gift of the verbal offering and so forth, and one will have the fleshly eye.

original: gang gi tshe bsam gtan dag pa de'i tshe mig mi 'dzums pa lha'i mig dang lha'i rna bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bsam gtan dag pa de'i tshe mig mi 'dzums pa lha'i mig dang lha'i rna bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When the concentrations are pure, then one will have the divine eye and divine ear without winking.

original: gang gi tshe rtag tu dbu mar 'bab pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro //

original: dgod pa dang / blta ba dang / kun du reg pa dang / 'khyud pa dang / lag pa 'dzin pa dang / gnyis gnyis sbyor bas phyag rgya ma'i dbang bskur ba rnam pa drug dang rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: dgod pa dang / blta ba dang / kun du reg pa dang / 'khyud pa dang / lag pa 'dzin pa dang / gnyis gnyis sbyor bas phyag rgya ma'i dbang bskur ba rnam pa drug dang rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: The six types of empowerment of the consort are laughing, looking, kissing, touching all over, embracing, holding hands, and coupling.

original: 'di rnams kyi slob dpon dang gsang ba la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi slob dpon dang gsang ba la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: These are the three types of empowerment conferred by the master, the secret, and so forth.

original: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // bzhi pa de slar de bzhin no //
analyzed: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // bzhi pa de slar de bzhin no //
translated: The fourth is the master, the secret wisdom, and again, just so.

original: zhes so // dbang bskur ba la sogs nges par bstan pa 'di la //
analyzed: zhes so // dbang bskur ba la sogs nges par bstan pa 'di la //
translated: This is the definitive teaching on the consecration, and so on.

original: rgyud sna tshogs su dbang bskur ba du ma gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyud sna tshogs su dbang bskur ba du ma gsungs te /
translated: There are many consecrations taught in various tantras.

original: mdor bsdus pas rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du bzhi gsungs so //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pas rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du bzhi gsungs so //
translated: In brief, four are taught in the Yoga and Yoginƒ´ Tantras.

original: bya ba'i rgyud du ni shes rab mas dgod pas bde ba nyams su myong ba dgod pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i rgyud du ni shes rab mas dgod pas bde ba nyams su myong ba dgod pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: In the Action Tantras, the consecration is the consecration of the experience of bliss by the descent of the wisdom.

original: spyod pa'i rgyud du shes rab ma la bltas pas bde ba las blta ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //üîΩrnal 'byor bla ma'i rgyud du ni shes rab ma'i nu ma gnyis la reg pa las 'gyur ba'i bde ba ni nu ma la reg pa'i'o //
analyzed: spyod pa'i rgyud du shes rab ma la bltas pas bde ba las blta ba'i dbang bskur ba'o // rnal 'byor bla ma'i rgyud du ni shes rab ma'i nu ma gnyis la reg pa las 'gyur ba'i bde ba ni nu ma la reg pa'i'o //
translated: In the Conduct Tantras, the consecration is the consecration of the view from bliss by the gaze of the wisdom.üîΩIn the Highest Yoga Tantras, the consecration is the consecration of the touch of the breasts from the bliss of the touch of the breasts of the wisdom.

original: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud du shes rab ma'i lag pa 'dzin pas bde ba ni lag pa 'dzin pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud du shes rab ma'i lag pa 'dzin pas bde ba ni lag pa 'dzin pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: In the Unsurpassed Yoga Tantras, the consecration is the consecration of the holding of the hand from the bliss of holding the hand of the wisdom.

original: 'dus pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du 'khyud pa'i bde ba las /üîΩ'khyud pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du 'khyud pa'i bde ba las / 'khyud pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: In the Yoga Tantras, the consecration is from the bliss of embrace in the assembly and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du yang gnyis gnyis bskyod pa las gnyis ka'i bde ba las gnyis gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du yang gnyis gnyis bskyod pa las gnyis ka'i bde ba las gnyis gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: In the Yoginƒ´ Tantras, the consecration is from the bliss of both in the shaking of both.

original: bcu drug gi ngo bo can bzhi 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mi rnams kyi gnyis la rnam pa gsum mo zhes pa mdor bsdus nas dbang bskur ba'o //üîΩbum pa dang gsad ba dang shes rab kyi mtshan cing las gsum mo //
analyzed: bcu drug gi ngo bo can bzhi 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mi rnams kyi gnyis la rnam pa gsum mo zhes pa mdor bsdus nas dbang bskur ba'o // bum pa dang gsad ba dang shes rab kyi mtshan cing las gsum mo //
translated: The consecration is summarized as being of sixteen types, four in the desire realm, three in the form realm, and three in the formless realm.

original: slob dpon la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba la /
analyzed: slob dpon la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba la /
translated: The consecration of the master and so forth is of three types: vase, killing, and wisdom.

original: 'dir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: 'dir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis so //

original: bzhi pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: bzhi pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /

analyzed: med pa bde ba chen po thams cad stong pa rgyu dang 'bras bu 'gog pas 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de ni kakkola ra gnas pa'i h'um phat yi ge'i mtshan nyid gsum par 'gyur bar 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: That is not suitable as the third characteristic of the syllable h≈´·πÉ pha·π≠, which is located in the kakkola.

analyzed: 'di ltar yang / bo lar gnas pa yang dbang bzhi pa de kho na nyid kyi dbang rab tu gsal bar byed do zhes pa 'jig rten pa'i dbang ni de kho na nyid tshul gnyis su med pa dang bral ba ste de ni 'dir stong pa nyid dang snying rje tha mi
translated: In this way,üîΩthat which is located in the bola also clarifies the fourth empowerment, the empowerment of reality.üîΩThe mundane empowerment is devoid of the nondual reality of the two modes.
